dublin_core.dcvalue: Dr. Andrew Bastawrous, Peek Vision, Email: andrew@peekvision.org | Dr. Andrew Cooper, Queen Elizabeth Diamond Jubilee Trust, Email: andrew.cooper@qejuileetrust.org

Peek Vision is a mobile based application and clip on hardware that transforms low-cost Android smartphones into an eye examination and diagnostic suite that is capable of running a variety of eye tests. Integration with Google Maps allows for patient follow-up and treatment.
Made available in DSpace on 2020-10-14T10:19:05Z (GMT). No. of bitstreams: 1 peek_vision.pdf: 191417 bytes, checksum: 924bfd124068d3481a7a6dba47930c75 (MD5)
